# NOAA bottle measurements from oct to nov 2019.
There are two sample sites in our area of interst but thats something. 
```{r}
# Read in packages
library(tidyverse)
library(tmap)
library(sf)
```

```{r}
# read in the csv file
data <- read_csv("/Users/jfrench/Documents/MEDS/Capstone/DATA/RL-19-05_BTL_CTD_data v2.0.csv")
```

```{r}
# convert lat and long columns to sf
data <- data |> 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("Longitude", "Latitude"),
           crs = 4326)
```

```{r}
# Create map to see where the samples were taken
tmap_mode(mode = "view")

tm_shape(data) +
  tm_dots()
```
